ffplot

The goal of ffplot is to easily visualize the data scraped from the ESPN API, via the fflr package, using the ggplot2 tools.

Installation

You can install the development version of ffplot from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("kiernann/ffplot")

Usage

All ffplot functions take take from the fflr package.

library(fflr)
library(ffplot)
team_points(league_standings(252353))
